title: [[Translated article]] Acne Keloidalis Nuchae: A Therapeutic Challenge for Dermatologists
details: L Ortiz-Lobato, A Imbernón-Moya, D Saceda-Corralo… - Actas Dermo-Sifiliográficas, 2025
abstract: Acne keloidalis nuchae (AKN) is a chronic inflammatory dermatosis of the scalp that causes scarring alopecia. The etiology of AKN has been associated with an immune response vs follicular antigens. AKN is characterized by fibrotic papules and plaques …
